hopobject.name: kinect like 3D camera
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/68.0.3440.106 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body: There are many ways to perform 3D imaging. In this build, we use temporally encoded structured light to recreate a 3D scene using embedded hardware. The system is battery powered and easily portable. Place the camera in front of the scene, press the button to start the scan and after a few seconds a 3D point cloud is ready!
hopobject.shortdesc: Completely Portable 3D camera using structured light! Build complete with detailed instructions starting from scratch. Very similar to Microsoft Kinect.
